title: Stool/chair, 1988
medium: Polished cast aluminum, chrome-plated steel, ebonized ashwood, molded rubber
provenance: 2013, acquired by Cooper-Hewitt. 2003 or earlier, acquired by Irwin and Linda Berman.
dimensions:
H x W x D (closed): 48.3 x 45.7 x 33 cm (19 x 18 x 13 in.)
H x W x D (open): 84.8 x 54 x 34.9 cm (33 3/8 x 21 1/4 x 13 3/4 in.)
creditline: The Linda and Irwin R. Berman Stool Collection
description: Black, rectangular seat on tapering aluminum cabriole legs; seat, hinged on short side, flips open to form chair having three rows of pink rubber studs on seat and corresponding indentations in back.

tombstone.epitaph: Stool/chair, 1988. Polished cast aluminum, chrome-plated steel, ebonized ashwood, molded rubber. The Linda and Irwin R. Berman Stool Collection. 2013-50-21.
